item.title: Some of the things Gaza needs: A government, security and tools to rebuild
item.description: A shaky ceasefire is holding. Now the Palestinian territory is in urgent need of a functioning government, order on the streets, and resources to star...

item.title: Trump escalates pressure on Venezuelan drug trade. And, judge pauses shutdown layoffs
item.description: Trump escalates pressure on Venezuela by authorizing covert CIA operations. And, a federal judge halts the Trump administration's shutdown layoffs.

item.title: Targets of Trump's Justice Department must pay up, even if they win

item.title: 80-year-old grandmother becomes oldest woman to finish the Ironman World Championship
item.description: Just 20 years ago, Natalie Grabow was learning to swim. Now she's hailed as an inspiration after winning her age group at the famously grueling triath...

item.title: Health insurance premiums are going up next year — unless you work at these companies
item.description: As U.S. health insurance costs rise, some companies are paying for all of their workers' premiums. It's a big expense — but they say it pays off.
